text:
Sure... No, really, thank you so much...!
Yes, then please excuse me!

Ahh, sorry I was being pretty loud.
That was a briefing with the costume designer.

Costume...
Would that be for our costumes?

You bet! They'll be sending them over soon it seems.
Man, I'm getting excited...!
...For some reason it seem like you're happier than us, huh.

I-Is that right?
I mean, are you not happy about it?

Ehhh...
It's not that like that's the case...
Mmm, I won't know until I try it on, right?

Yeah... exactly!
Once the costumes arrive, I'll get you to try your on.
